title._content: ["Cragston," John Pierpont Morgan house, Highland Falls, New York. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["Cragston," John Pierpont Morgan house, Highland Falls, New York. Spring bulbs] [ca. 1913] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. Today: House and garden not extant. On slide (handwritten): "M" and "Morgan, Mrs. J.P., Cragston, Highland Falls, N.Y." Also, red stroke mark and gold star sticker. Photographed when Frances Benjamin Johnston and Mattie Edwards Hewitt worked together. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Photo shows field of tulips and daffodils. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Gardens--New York (State)--Highland Falls--1910-1920. Flowers--New York (State)--Highland Falls--1910-1920. Format: Lantern slides--Hand-colored--1910-1920. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16233 Call Number: LC-J717-X100- 24
